mdRecord.dcterms:title: One hundred & fifty miles around Richmond
Battle ground of the Wilderness and Spottsylvania Court House, May 5-23, 1864
One hundred and fifty miles around Richmond
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Magnus, Charles.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Charles Magnus' New York Printing Establishment
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 53 cm. in diam., on sheet 74 x 88 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eleventh Edition 3000 of Magnus' all around Map.
At head of title: Battle ground of the Wilderness and Spottsylvania Court House. May 5-23, 1864.
The central circular map shows the country around Richmond, and is surrounded by nine smaller circular maps of other battle areas. Map in blue with red border and title.

Ancillary maps: 225 miles around Vicksburg, Miss. -- Memphis and Nashville, Tenn. -- Knoxville, Tenn., Danville, Ky. and Parkersburg, Va. -- 100 miles around Chattanooga, Tenn. -- 250 miles around Galveston, Texas -- 250 miles around Charleston, S.C. -- Fortifications around Richmond, Va. -- 200 miles around Montgomery, Ala. -- 100 miles around Milledgeville, Ga.
"Dedicated to the gallant soldiers, fighting to suppress the rebellion." -- In red, at lower right.
"Deutsche und englishe Buchdruckerei, lithographische Anstalt und Verlagshandlung" follows the imprint.
Stephenson and McKee, Virginia in Maps, Map IV-27 (A-B), reproduces an image of the 10th edition.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Mounted on linen. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond (Va.)--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Maps.
